home.title: Home
home.description: Hi, I am Julio, a front-end developer from Curitiba, Brazil. I write code and also write/speak about technology.

about.title: About
about.1st: My name is Julio Lozovei, aka [em]jlozovei[/em]. Nice to meet you!
about.2nd: I'm a front-end developer who lives and works in Curitiba, Brazil. I started to write HTML when was 15; beyond coding, I also love sports and music - I play guitar, bass and ukulele, but just as a hobby.
about.3rd: Beyond CSS and JavaScript, I also speaks Portuguese (native), English (advanced) and Spanish (almost advanced). I'm into web and mobile development, ux/ui, a bit of back-end and embedded system as well.
about.4th: I'm [myAge], write and speak about technology, career and development culture. You can find my texts in those links below:
